objects.text: 100% Pure Classic Fragrances: Lavender, Eucalyptus, Jasmine, Lemon, and Palmarose

product_details.name: Premium Aromatherapy Diffuser Oils Collection | The MANI PEDI Essentials
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure Classic Fragrances: Lavender, Eucalyptus, Jasmine, Lemon, and Palmarose
• Generous 1-Liter Size for Long-lasting Use

banner_details:
The banner showcases a clean and calming design centered around aromatherapy oils. It features a gently blended green gradient background with soft abstract wave and swirl motifs, evoking freshness and relaxation. The main visual component is a centered image of six aluminum diffuser oil bottles in various scents, scaled proportionally and neatly arranged to highlight product variety. The text elements include a bold green main heading ("heading"), a sleek purple subheading ("subheading"), and two informative descriptions ("description_1", "description_2") in dark gray for clarity. A prominent purple price ("price") and a green rectangular call-to-action button ("cta") complete the layout, ensuring clear visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green (#2e7d32, #388e3c)
- Soft Purple (#6a1b9a, #7b1fa2)
- Light Mint Green (#e8f5e9)
- Pale Green Gradient (#c8e6c9)
- Dark Gray (#424242)
- Pure White (#ffffff)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, metallic silver bottle design that reflects light beautifully, giving a premium feel. Each fragrance variant is marked by a unique vibrant color: deep brown (#4E3524) for Palmarosa, lavender purple (#6F5499) for Lavender, olive green (#4A6C41) for Eucalyptus, bright green (#51A234) for Jasmine, and fresh teal-green (#00A68B) for Lemon. The white background enhances the clarity and cleanliness, complementing the bold text and accent hues. The metallic silver (#C0C0C0) serves as a neutral base, allowing each color to pop while seamlessly blending into the uniform branding. This palette communicates freshness, wellness, and natural luxury.
